title: Perform a Cycle Count
description: A warehouse operator is tasked with performing a cycle count for a specific inventory item at a production line.

tasks.description: Retrieve the system's expected on-hand quantity for the specified item at that location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls the current inventory level from the ERP system.

tasks.description: Perform a physical count of the item at the location.
Enter the physical count into the system and flag any discrepancy for review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters the counted quantity and the system flags a variance for a manager to investigate.
